comment.text: The translation key "EditSecretKey" is used to display the label for editing a secret key in the API Keys settings dialog. It appears as a button header when editing an existing secret key and as a dialog title when creating a new one.

usage.context:
displayType={ModalDialogType.modal}
 autoMaxHeight
 >
 <ModalDialog.Header>
 {isEdit
 ? t("Settings:EditSecretKey")
 : t("Settings:CreateNewSecretKey")}
 </ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>{secretKey ? keyBody : createBody}</ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 {secretKey ? keyFooter : createFooter}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'secret keytä' which is a direct transliteration and not a natural Finnish phrasing. A more appropriate translation would be 'salainen avain' or 'salaisen avaimen'.
The use of a direct transliteration ('secret keytä') disrupts the flow and consistency of the Finnish text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'secret keytä' with 'salainen avain' to maintain consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Խմբագրել դատարկ բանալին" literally translates to "Edit empty key". "Secret key" implies confidentiality and security. A more accurate translation would convey this meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Խմբագրել գաղտնի բանալին (Khmbagerel gathni banalin) - Edit secret key. Or, Բանալի խմբագրել (Banalí khmbagerel) - Key edit.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation contains an excessive number of repeated characters 'ຸ'. This is likely a typographical error.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ແກ້ໄຂ ລະຫັດລັບ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'ແກ້ໄຂ' (gae khai) means 'edit' or 'modify', the rest of the translation is nonsensical.  'ແກ້ໄຂ ລະຫັດລັບ' is a more accurate translation of 'Edit secret key'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ແກ້ໄຂ ລະຫັດລັບ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Bewerk secret key" directly translates 'Edit' as 'Bewerk', which is technically correct but sounds slightly unnatural in Dutch in this context. A more idiomatic translation would use a verb implying modification or changing.

While 'Modificare cheie secretă' is understandable, a more natural and precise translation would be 'Modifică cheia secretă'. 'Modificare' is a more formal term, and 'Modifică' is more commonly used in this context.

While technically correct, 'සංස්කරණය කරන්න' (sanskaraṇaya karanna) translates to 'to edit' or 'to modify.' A more natural and precise translation for 'Edit' in this context might be 'ප්‍රතිස්ථානය කරන්න' (pratisthānaya karanna) which means 'to replace' or 'to change.' Considering 'secret key' is often replaced rather than edited, this would be more accurate.
